name: @papesambandour/network-tools
description: SSH Tunnel Manager with SSL Certificate Generation - Global CLI Tool

scripts.build:frontend: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run install-all && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean:package: rm -f server/data/*.db && find client/build -name '*.map' -type f -delete && touch server/data/.gitkeep
scripts.deploy:git: npm run build:all && npm run git:add && npm run git:push && npm run git:tag && npm run git:push:tags
scripts.publish:prepare: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm test
scripts.publish:npm: npm run publish:prepare && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:full: npm run build:all && git add . && git commit -m 'Release v'$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin main && npm run git:tag && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run publish:full
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run publish:full
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run publish:full

author: Pape Samba Ndour
